lines:
Received

File

M

of an opening in their Pekin

office where they are lakind 
charge of the building of de 
union 1 medecal college of the 
Rockefeller Foundation. I have 
worked two weeks and shall 
continue to work unitel etu 15th 
as september when I leave Boston 
for liter wast. Jam learning a 
great deal here and have determined 
to stick as long as I have time to 
do so.

52 536 Commonwealth Ave

Goston mass 
Answered 522

29 August 22, 1919 
My dear to. Stearns, 1956

Miss Lee had a 
freely bad attack of cronic 
appendicitis last week. Since 
chen I have been wondering 
whecher it is wise to have 
che operation here before she 
returns or to wait until it 
to becomes acute. I would

when are you coming back 
to Andover? I shall en 
on you before I leave

de indeed polife is lice

a veu

give

m

stemmer

Wishing you a

and 
me to the children 
Miss Clemons.

vremembe

--- and

to

will 
on etd matter. She had an 
X-ray picture taken of the 
appendix yesterday and will 
you please recommend me

Hour very sucere 
. Sungsing kwand

la

noi sareer

who will

ang perna
raw: Received  File  M  of an opening in their Pekin  office where they are lakind  charge of the building of de  union 1 medecal college of the  Rockefeller Foundation. I have  worked two weeks and shall  continue to work unitel etu 15th  as september when I leave Boston  for liter wast. Jam learning a  great deal here and have determined  to stick as long as I have time to  do so.  52 536 Commonwealth Ave  Goston mass  Answered 522  29 August 22, 1919  My dear to. Stearns, 1956  Miss Lee had a  freely bad attack of cronic  appendicitis last week. Since  chen I have been wondering  whecher it is wise to have  che operation here before she  returns or to wait until it  to becomes acute. I would  when are you coming back  to Andover? I shall en  on you before I leave  de indeed polife is lice  a veu  give  m  stemmer  Wishing you a  and  me to the children  Miss Clemons.  vremembe  --- and  to  will  on etd matter. She had an  X-ray picture taken of the  appendix yesterday and will  you please recommend me  Hour very sucere  . Sungsing kwand  la  noi sareer  who will  ang perna

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Handwritten letter with details about Miss Lee's medical condition, Kwan's return to China after completing his studies at Harvard, and requesting a loan of $300 for that trip (Pages 1 and 4)
metadata.note_acquisition: Phillips Academy Archives and Special Collections received the letters and materials of Sung Sing Kwan from Alfred E. Stearns in ____(date)
metadata.note_preferred-citation: From The Trustees of Phillips Academy.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
